org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowRemoteViews

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowRemoteViews

@Implements(value=android.widget.RemoteViews.class)
public class ShadowRemoteViews
extends Object

Shadow for RemoteViews that simulates its implementation. Supports pending intents for events, changing visibility, setting text, updating etc...
